archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Data Reconciliation Service [DRS]
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Data Reconciliation Settlement Service. A reconciliation engine that compares the counter generated Network Banking, Debit Card and Electronic Top-Up (ETU) transactions from the Branch Database with the Transaction Processing Service (TPS) view, which is sent to the POL-FS and the Financial Institution view.
Services that update external clients (e.g. Banking, ePay) have to be reconciled to create a consistent view of the completed transactions. Note that this does not include AP transactions as these are reconciled by the AP client and any discrepancies investigated manually by the FSC.
For Network Banking transactions the Financial Institution view is presented by the Transaction Enquiry Service (TES), whereas for ETU, a daily ETU file-feed is used while for Debit Card, the FI view is represented by confirmations returned from GlobalPay and from TES.
